title: Season restart?
body: When is the season restart - and what did the maintenance today have to do with the restart? I'm confused.

replies.body:
Season 3 and 4 started January/February, so take that as you will.

I honestly think this "new" jungle needs a bit more tweaking before they can say its balanced enough for the season to start.
The new season times have not been announced yet and the maintenance today wasn't regarding the season start.
